body.name: Fanola No Yellow Shampoo 11.8oz / 2pk - Color Depositing Purple Shampoo for Blonde, Silver, Gray, and Highlighted Hair - Anti Brass Shampoo Toner to Remove Yellow Tones & Brassiness from Bleached Hair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 4 mins
features: Gently Cleanse Blonde Hair & Remove Yellow Tones - Transform your hair color from yellow to 'oh wow' with Fanola's anti brass purple shampoo toner for blonde hair, which will remove brassiness & neutralize yellow tones to preserve your light, bright blonde hair in between salon services. Immediately remove any undesired yellow tones in bleached, highlighted, blonde, silver, and gray hair with violet pigments for a shiny, silky light colored hair.

Antioxidant Ingredients - This anti brass purple shampoo is enriched with extra violet pigments to maintain a cool & even tone. Infused with antioxidant grape extract + silk protein ingredients to effectively re-tone yellow hair from bleached blonde hair, while ensuring a healthy look & feel with this nourishing formula.

Maintain Your Perfect Blonde - This toning purple shampoo for blonde hair will help preserve your preferred blonde tone in between color services for a bright, light hair color by removing unwanted tones- including yellow, brassy, or muddy. Fanola's purple shampoo toner is suitable for all blonde types, including super-lightened, bleached, and gray. For best results, build your blonde routine with Fanola's purple shampoo, toner mask, and incredible foam.

How to Use - Apply Fanola Anti-Yellow Shampoo to wet hair and massage. Leave on for 1 to 5 minutes, lather and rinse thoroughly. For best results, follow with No Yellow Purple Mask as a system to ensure your ideal blonde tone by leaving it with a cold tone and a soft, shiny, silky texture. *Pro Tip: Can be used to pre-tone bleached hair or on super lightened hair, as well as on clients wanting less yellow tones.

Professional Hair Care Made in Italy - Fanola is a professional Italian hair care brand that aims for the highest quality values, processes, and ingredients across all products. Inclusive beauty is at the brand's core with over 10 different product ranges in professional hair care, color, and styling categories. The brand has been in the market for over 15 years and continues to explore different areas of innovation to restructure, balance, and improve worldwide hair wellness.
body.description: With time comes change, and hair is usually the first place we notice it. But don't stress any more if the grey streaks are setting in. Fanola has you covered with their line of No Yellow Shampoo. It's made with a violet pigment that turns down the grey or lightened hairs to be less noticeable. There's nothing wrong with going grey, but this No Yellow Shampoo helps you keep your color consistent and vibrant. It's an easy way to help time pass with a little more grace. No Yellow is used for bleached, blonde, streaked, and grey hair.Features:Ideal, for grey, super lightened, or decolored hairViolet pigment tones down unwanted yellow hues on grey, light blonde, or streaked hairSHAMPOONo Yellow Shampoo neutralizes yellow reflections driving from pigment residue after bleaching, lightening and the oxidizing action of the elements. No Yellow treatment is the only professional treatment formulated with a special violet pigment with intensive action that neutralizes yellow reflections giving the hair a cool, bright, even reflection.How/When: Apply on damp or dry hair for 1-3 minutes and rinse. Use gloves to prevent staining of the hands. Apply once a week or when yellow becomes visible.SKU: SO-26-02-AMZ9

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purple shampoo on the market
reviews.reviewText: This is the best purple shampoo I’ve ever used. I use once a week to keep up with my platinum highlights. It’s not the best for your hair because of the chemicals, but it will 100% get rid of any brassiness and if leave it in for while, it will make hair silver and leave it in even longer it will make your hair have a purple tint. NOTE: THIS WILL STAIN YOUR NAILS — but easy to wash off if you scrub. I recommend using a hair mask afterwards instead of conditioner since it can dry your hair out a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Purple Shampoo
reviews.reviewText: As A blonde who wants a super white, icy look - this is the purple shampoo to do it. It removes the yellow quickly and is an intense icy blonde after washing. It does make your hair a little dry, so I don't reccomened using more than 2X a week. But all in all, it is my favorite and most effective ICY Blonde Result!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing love it
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect my bottle arrived in perfect best product ever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo not only protects your highlights from brassiness — it cleans and shines! Great value too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brightens hair.. BUT,
reviews.reviewText: This product t works well. It brightens your hair and makes it shiny. The only problem was the packaging. It arrived loose in a box and it was leaking all over. You can see the seal did not work. I lost some of the product because of the poor packaging. Hopefully the company will solve this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST HAVE FOR BLONDES
reviews.reviewText: If you have bleached hair, highlights, etc. and do not like the brassy look that happens after the toner fades/washes out this is the BEST purple shampoo I have ever used. I’ll use it every other week to keep the yellow out I don’t keep it on very long because my hair is on the dryer side. IF YOU KEEP IT ON TOO LONG YOUR HAIR WILL TURN PURPLE. It is a little drying so I would definitely recommend using a good conditioner or deep conditioning after using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done, I like it.
reviews.reviewText: This product definitely does its job and helps relieve that brassy undertone and keeps my hair looking pretty fresh. The only thing I don’t like about it is it will stain your hands purple although it comes off after you wash your hands a few times. The directions do say to use gloves. It also seems to leave my hair very dry and tangled. But overall I would recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel great and shiny hair after
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo was recommended by my hairdresser - I went white/gray and I love how it softens makes my hair looks great!
This shampoo really works in getting brass out of blonde hair
Excelente shampoo, deja un aroma delicioso en el cabello a limpio y cumple con si funcion matificante, llego super rápido y muy bien empaquetado. Lo recomiendo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Have yellow hair? This product is a must buy!
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely obsessed with this product because it flat out works. It’s very pigmented and works better than any other salon product I’ve ever bought. I have very white almost silver blonde highlights and am a natural blonde. In order to keep up with that look it’s hard to avoid getting yellow and brassy. I use this product once a week and it’s the best. Beware it smells like old lady shampoo and can dry your hair out if you over use. So don’t use it more than once a week. Also don’t leave it on for more than a minute or two. Your hair will be purple if you do. Great news is it washes out after a wash or two. It’s a must buy! At this price and size you will be set for a year, maybe even two!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good stuff Global hub doing great selling through Amazon
reviews.reviewText: Good stuffGlobal hub doing great selling through Amazon
Make sure Following instructions don't leave on too long. Works so great for blondes. Removing unwanted yellow tones in your hair!
